word_mean: 腹泻：粪排泄异常频繁，呈液状
粪便稀薄，排便次数增加的表现，是多种类似症状的统称。
以腹泻、便溏为主要表现的疾病。

sentence.Network_en: They may complain of diarrhea or bellyache.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们可能会主诉腹泻或腹痛。

sentence.Network_en: The doctors attempted to reduce his high fever by inducing diarrhea with a purgative.
sentence.Network_cn: 医生们尝试用通便药物催泻以使他退烧。

sentence.Network_en: Diarrhea may occur around the impaction and often with fecal incontinence.
sentence.Network_cn: 在粪块嵌塞期间可发生腹泻,并常有大便失禁.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2.【腹泻】（diarrhea）是一种常见症状，是指排便次数明显超过平日习惯的频率，粪质稀薄，水分增加，每日排便量超过200g，或含.
《Friends》词汇表B ... Ossymb 〈化〉锇 diarrhea n. 痢疾,腹泻 unacceptable adj. 无法接受的, 不受欢迎的.
English slang and idiom - 豆丁网 ... My stomach is upset. 我的胃不舒服 diarrhea 拉肚子吃牛排时， rare，medium 或.
译网情深 - 打印文章 - ... secretory IgA 分泌型免疫球蛋白 scour,diarrhea 腹泻，下痢 quotient 商.

list.abs: 麻江县疾控中心 ... 2.1腹泻 diarrhea 2.2感染性腹泻 infectious diarrhea 2.3 百日咳Ⅰ相血清 bordetella pertussis phageⅠseram.
diabetic coma 糖尿病性昏睡diabetic diarrhea 糖尿病性腹泻diabetic diet 糖尿病饮食
serous cystoma 浆液性囊肿serous diarrhea 浆液性腹泻serous fluid 浆液
小儿腹泻 (infantile diarrhea) 福建省立医院儿科杨芳定义一组由多病原, 一组由多病原,多因素引起的以大便次数增多和大便性状改.

means.word_mean: 1. frequent and watery bowel movements; can be a symptom of infection or food poisoning or colitis or a gastrointestinal tumor

sentences.en: Three days later his diarrhea was checked.
sentences.cn: 三天以后他的痢疾止住了。
